title: Time to Spank the Stewf
content:
On this day many, many years ago, a Stewf was born.  
If you see the Stewf in NYC, hug him and spank him, then buy him a drink.

Happy Happy Happy Birthday!!!

 [‹ First "Critique Thursday"](http://web.archive.org/web/20080106234408/http:/typophile.com/node/14608 "Go to previous forum topic") [RSS ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080106234408/http:/typophile.com/node/12391 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Zara Evens

comments.content:
Happy Birthday, Stewf.. :) _Alles Gute.._

_( Have a nice time celebrating your birthday AND ’The Type Week’.. :)_

Happy BD man. NY. What an opportune place to celebrate! Many more.

hhp
Happy birthday, Stewf!

Happy Birthday.

I may forgo the spanking if I run into you in NYC (and someone identifies you). But the well-wishing is consistent at any hour.

Stewf,  
Happy Birthday! Planning any more movie trailers?  
:-)

ChrisL
Happy Birthday, Stewf. May you find time to celebrate your birthday and not get too many spankings. ;^)

happy birthday little buddy.

i will give you such a pinch!

Happy Birthday, Stephen!

I’m starting to pick up the pattern: If it’s time for TypeCon, it’s time for Stephen’s birthday. I should realize this by now.

I’ve been out all day wandering around Brooklyn. I would stop by to say it in person, but now I think it’s probably too late. (Too late for me, anyway.)

Cheers...

Happy birthday to a fabulous type geek! A bunch of us had the pleasure of enjoying a picnic in my hotel room, complete with cake, in honor of the day of Stevie C’s birth. There were hugs, pinches, and some tasty beverages. Can’t wait to see everyone tomorrow (today) at the Roosevelt bar around 8pm! Everyone buy Stewf a cocktail - he’s so adorable when he’s tipsy.
Naw, he’s adorable all the time.

Absolutely adorable. Freshly [ascotted](http://web.archive.org/web/20080106234408/http:/www.flickr.com/photos/stewf/180488635/) or otherwise.

Have a happy, happy stewf.

WOW...  
another year older already?  
H-B-D Stewf!
Happy Birthday, Stephen. :^)
happy birthday, stewf

happy birthday to a great ambassador of type.  
hope it’s great, stewf!
Happy Birthday, Stephen!

Here’s hoping you have a Stewfendous Birthday!

ChrisL
Happy Birthday, Stephen. We shall celebrate (albeit late) in style in Boston... it’s not TypeCon without a Stewfsday extravaganza...

Whattayou, 26 now? Happy frickin b-day! in Noo Yokk yet!

Cawl
Happy birthday, Stephen. One more year of bringing the word (and its letters) to the people. See you in Boston!

happy birthday little buddy.

i will give you such a pinch!

Happy birthday, Sensei. ;^) :^P

Enjoy.

Give Stewf nuggies!

ChrisL
Happy Birthday again, Stephen!

` > Happy Birthday, Stewf.. :) Alles Gute..`

Even if I may repeat myself: Happy, Happy, Mr. Stewf. :)

[Dav](http://web.archive.org/web/20080106234408/http:/www.dav.name/)

Thank you, friends. I was a little disoriented by the lack of TypeCon peeps surrounding my birthday this year, but they took good care of me here\* and I shall see many of you very soon.

\* Swedish smorgasbord, courtesy of FontShop:
